name: Absolute Mastery
desc: For every rank X of magic of the user, obtain the effects: if Anima magic rank = X :gets AOE*(2) in every attack. If Dark magic rank= X the attacks of the user ignore 100% RES. If Staves magic rank = X the attacks of the user increment the range in 2 and if Light magic rank = X user gains +2 extra attacks (+4 if unit doubles).
